column2: BRIEF-FBL Financial Group Posts Quarterly Loss Per Share Of $0.10 May 7 (Reuters) - FBL Financial Group Inc: * Q1 FINANCIAL RESULTS WERE NEGATIVELY IMPACTED BY FINANCIAL MARKET PERFORMANCE RELATED TO COVID-19 PANDEMIC Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-FBL Financial Increases Quarterly Cash Dividend, Declares Special Cash Dividend of $1.50 Per Share Feb 26 (Reuters) - FBL Financial Group Inc: * FBL FINANCIAL GROUP INCREASES QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND, DECLARES SPECIAL CASH DIVIDEND AND NAMES NEW DIRECTOR * FBL FINANCIAL GROUP INC - ANNOUNCES A 4.2% INCREASE IN ITS QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND TO $0.50 PER SHARE * FBL FINANCIAL GROUP INC - DECLARES A SPECIAL CASH DIVIDEND OF $1.50 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-FBL Financial Group Chief Investment Officer To Retire Feb 24 (Reuters) - FBL Financial Group Inc: * FBL FINANCIAL GROUP CHIEF INVESTMENT OFFICER TO RETIRE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Fbl Financial Group Q4 Adjusted Operating Earnings Per Share $1.41 FBL Financial Group Inc: * FBL FINANCIAL GROUP REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2019 RESULTS * Q4 SALES $3.5 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-FBL Financial Group Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $0.94 May 3 (Reuters) - FBL Financial Group Inc: * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $182.2 MILLION VERSUS $181.9 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
